body: Ok, so in my nebula map, i was think about adding snowballs with punch I in them. But i wasn't sure if punch ACTUALLY worked on snowballs so im gonna ask yall :)

title: Question About Snowballs?

replies.body: It works. You have to modify the projectile. I can't explain it now. Maybe add me on skype, then I can tell you how. (flo.schmenni). But maybe I'm wrong, but maybe not.

replies.body: In the YML im pretty sure you can edit the force of impact of your target through the projectile, if you use command blocks use a testfor command, and when it hits the player, then when the testfor kicks in it adds knokcback :)
